title: Utilitia Validator
creator: Utilitia SP. z O.O.
description: Hereby we present an innovative service unique to the whole country which is an automatic tool used to check the accessibility of web pages. Using Utilitia, you can check the availability of your own or any other Internet site in a very fast and, what is more important, convenient way.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
